title: WiFi, Fitness Center, Business Center
posting_body: ['We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live.', 'We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach.', 'Where you live, is where you come alive.', ' In an area flourishing with convenience and possibility, Avalon Cerritos offers thoughtfully designed studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments and flats.', 'Imagine entertaining in modern kitchens with quartz stone countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances.', 'Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.', 'Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a pool and spa, state-of-the-art fitness center, and resident lounge with pool table and entertaining kitchen.', 'Our community is conveniently located off of Artesia Fwy, making commuting a breeze.', ' This is not just apartment living.', 'This is living up.', 'Rent: $2880', 'Bedrooms: 1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Apartment Features:', 'Balcony', '4th Floor', 'Community Amenities:', 'Parking', 'WiFi', 'Package Acceptance', 'Lounge', 'Controlled Access', 'Pool', 'Fitness Center', 'Call us!', 'show contact info', 'To learn more about this unit, visit us at <URL>', 'Prices and availability are subject to change.']
